AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: budding fighter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time helping the other adults in the farm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: farmhand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time hanging out fighters as a kid.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: frog enthusiast
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s favourite animal growing up was the frog. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days drawing frogs, reading books about frogs, asking every adult [PAWN_pronoun] saw about frogs, and even made a little frog enclosure and started keeping some.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: crazy frog dude
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s frog obsession got out of hand and [PAWN_pronoun] became a full-fledged frog maniac. [PAWN_nameDef] always carries some frogs safely tucked away in [PAWN_possessive] pockets and insists on making ponds in the weirdest, most inconvenient places possible.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Warrior Clan member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the Warrior Clan, the tribe members usually responsible for protecting Namekian settlements.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragon Clan member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the Dragon Clan, namekians who have special powers related to healing and other types of magic.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ajisa expert
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert in the Ajisa, beautiful plants native to the original planet Namek. These skills ended up translating to other farming activities.
